title: ScarfAThon
body: Two washes in & it‚Äôs nothing short of a b s o l u t e comfort & joy this Holiday season. Or‚Ä¶ SO I thought! Dang, you got me on this one. While yes, it‚Äôs true this pretty scarf may be worn year round, is soft at 1st few touches & fringed uniformly; EvenEVENeven with the absolute b e s t possible care, this synthetics-heavy scarf is a no-thanks for me. IF only wearing it a handful of times you probably wouldn‚Äôt become terribly disappointed. That is, so long as you are w e l l aware this item is in no possible way ‚Äònatural‚Äô. Wrapping up in synthetics, even at an affordable price is still very d i s a p p o I n t i n g in my view, full stop. I believe, that is I well know, we can do better. If pilling doesn‚Äôt make you break out welp the upside is just how generous the cut, it is long + wide enough to wrapWRAPwrap around shoulders. Sweetly pink, too.* HINT; When a seller is reluctant to bring f o r w a r d front AND center the materials used in manufacturing, it‚Äôs as good as any confession, written OR oral reporting s h o u t i n g and I mean announcing to the world at large: ‚ÄòSynthetics‚Äô. Because reputable, luxury brands actually careCAREcare whichWHAThuh fibers they choose bring their patrons.On the other hand, if you need a temporary product with no longevity available, if nubby, broken, balled-up fibers {cause of pilling} brings no real bothersome effects for ya, then buy away!Because I need natural fibers against my skin due to some glitchy autoimmune junk, for me it‚Äôs a one & done here though. Dang! Live & learn.C r i n g e

title: Very soft, very warm
body: This scarf ended up being great for travel. I think it will be a go to packing item for trips going forward because it can be used in so many different ways. It really is soft, the material is thick and warm too and the color was rich. I was impressed with the quality. You could wear as traditional scarf, over your head/hair, around your shoulders, etc.

title: So soft and beautiful
body: I bought this because my favorite pale pink scarf is kinda outdated and worn out. Blush pink was too pale and more of a peachy skin tone color, but baby pink is a beautiful soft pink. I also love that this doubles as a shawl for formal occasions. Now I want more colors!

title: nice scarf but either wrong or misrepresented color
body: The scarf is a nice scarf--as nice as any i've bought from high end stores. It is soft and feels like natural materials (as it says it is made from natural materials). It doesn't feel hot or scratchy. But, either the color in the pic is off or they sent me the wrong scarf. I ordered light brown and what I received says light brown on the bag, but really looks just like the khaki scarf in the picture. So if you are hoping for a light brown scarf, be aware that the picture may not be at all what you will get.**update, I reordered the light brown and they actually sent light brown. I did get Khaki the first time around. Both are nice scarfs though--love the light brown.

title: Great quality scarf and very affordable
body: Love how thick and soft the fabric is and the variety of colors offered. Feels really nice around my neck and keeps my neck warm. I ordered 6 different colors and love them all. I would definitely recommend this scarf.

title: Soft and warm

title: Impressed
body: I had rather mediocre expectations and just needed a black scarf for my trip up north. The scarf was surprisingly soft and the material seems more expensive. It doesn‚Äôt pick up lint or fuzz easily. It ended up drizzling all day and night walking around NYC - it was big enough to wrap fully around my head to keep my hair dry while keeping me warm. Highly recommend.

title: It is exactly what you see
body: It is exactly what you see. It is thick enough to prevent the wind from coming through but thin enough where it doesn‚Äôt weight much. It‚Äôs long and soft enough to wear as a shaw around shoulders and cover arms without being itchy. The black color is vibrant and keeps its vibrancy even after a few washes. It also has not shedded or frayed after a few washes. I would recommend this scarf to anyone.

title: Lovely
body: I highly recommend this scarf. I purchased it for an Alaskan cruise in October and it was perfect! Very versatile to wear as a scarf under my jacket while outdoors to wearing it as a wrap on the ship. I was able to limit my clothes on the trip because of the versatility and quality of this scarf. Highly recommend the scarf in this color which is very rich and can be used with lots of colors.

title: AMAZING!!! Best purchase I've ever made.
body: Where do I start?! It's soft as can be, it's a beautiful color, and versatile? Girl! Let me tell you. It's a scarf. It's a shawl. It's a blanket. It's decor. It's a skirt. It's AHMAZING!!! ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ I have never loved an article of clothing like I love this scarf.

title: Loved it so much went back and bought another one
body: Great color, softness, length, width. Use as a head scarf or wrap when it's cold. It's super warm and so soft. I got a sky blue and olive green. Beautiful natural looking colors. I wash it in cold on delicate with Woolite fabric detergent to keep it nice as long as possible.
